Package views

Class ConsoleInterface

java.lang.Object
views.ConsoleInterface
public class ConsoleInterface extends Object
The ConsoleInterface class represents a console-based user interface that provides methods to display messages, input integers, and input strings. It also contains a Scanner object to handle user input.
Author:
Timothy Lee, Justin Wong, Jun Hao, Lee Cheng Yao, Abhishekh

      Parameters:
